## pmBuild variable

A short hand way for building prosemirror test builders with the core nodes already provided - `doc` - `paragraph` - `text`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pmBuild: <GObj extends Record<string, pm.NodeTypeAttributes | pm.MarkTypeAttributes> = Record<string, pm.NodeTypeAttributes | pm.MarkTypeAttributes>, GNodes extends string = string, GMarks extends string = string>(testSchema: Schema<GNodes, GMarks>, names: GObj) => Record<GNodes, (...args: (string | pm.TaggedProsemirrorNode<any> | pm.TaggedFlatObject<any>)[]) => pm.TaggedProsemirrorNode<Schema<GNodes, GMarks>>> & Record<GMarks, (...args: (string | pm.TaggedProsemirrorNode<any> | pm.TaggedFlatObject<any>)[]) => pm.TaggedFlatObject<Schema<GNodes, GMarks>>> & { [P in keyof ({
    doc: {
        nodeType: string;
    };
    p: {
        nodeType: string;
    };
    text: {
        nodeType: string;
    };
} & GObj)]: ({
    doc: {
        nodeType: string;
    };
    p: {
        nodeType: string;
    };
    text: {
        nodeType: string;
    };
} & GObj)[P] extends pm.NodeTypeAttributes ? (...args: (string | pm.TaggedProsemirrorNode<any> | pm.TaggedFlatObject<any>)[]) => pm.TaggedProsemirrorNode<Schema<GNodes, GMarks>> : (...args: (string | pm.TaggedProsemirrorNode<any> | pm.TaggedFlatObject<any>)[]) => pm.TaggedFlatObject<Schema<GNodes, GMarks>>; }
```
